column2:
'need to configure MLflow to point to the workspace where the tracking'
'should happen.'
'\xc2\x7 You can run any training routine that uses MLflow in Azure Machine Learning'
'without any change.'
'\xc2\xae Note'
"Unlike the Azure Machine Learning SDK v1, there's no logging functionality in the"
'SDK v2 and we recommend using MLflow for logging. Such strategy allows your'
'training routines to ecome cloud-agnostic and portale, removing any'
'dependency in your code with Azure Machine Learning.'
'Tracking with MLflow'
'Azure Machine Learning uses MLflow Tracking for metric logging and artifact storage for'
'your experiments. When connected to Azure Machine Learning, all tracking performed'
